name: Puppet Master: The Game
description:
THE PUPPET ARE BACK!


October Games and Full Moon Features proudly introduce Puppet Master: The Game!

This Free to Play online multiplayer game will celebrate the series' 30 year legacy. Revisit iconic locations, select from a large roster of playable characters from the movies. Play a variety of online multiplayer game modes, each inspired by the Puppet’s many adventures.


THIEF ( 3 vs 1 GAME MODE)

Ever wanted to flip the standard Asymmetrical Multiplayer Horror Game formula? Where 3 heinous Puppets stalk a lone Human survivor? As a Human you must steal Andre Toulon's secretes of reanimation and escape with your life. As the Puppets must protect your Master’s secret at all cost! Sneak up on your prey and unleash a pint-sized siege of terror!


THE FUTURE

The excitement doesn’t stop after release. We want to take Puppet Master fans for a ride of frequent content updates. With each update, we will introduce new characters, skins, levels, and game modes to keep things fresh and exciting!
